name: 合唱指揮（一）
description:
1. To develop choral conducting skill and to gain knowledge about choral literature. 
2. To experience conducting various types of choral repertoires which cover different kinds of musical styles. 
3. To learn how to work with people as a group leader and hence, developing interpersonal and organizational skills. 
4. To improve individual musicianship by conducting and interpreting more different types of choral music.
goals: To develop choral conducting skill and to gain knowledge about choral literature.
To experience conducting various types of choral repertoires which cover different kinds of musical styles.
To learn how to work with people as a group leader and hence, developing interpersonal and organizational skills.
To improve individual musicianship by conducting and interpreting more different types of choral music.

methodologies.note: 老師講授示範，學生觀察學習。
根據各種指揮理論 討論指揮實用技巧
學生輪流上台指揮 亦輪流擔任合唱團員
每次上台一定錄影 以錄影來審視檢討自己的指揮動作

grading.note: 是否針對閱讀專題參與課堂討論
音樂比賽觀摩及合唱音樂會欣賞
每次指揮技巧熟練與否及進步情形
